name: Touhou Fairy War 2 ~ Inconsistent Memories
description:
Shouldn't now be summer? Cirno, the ice fairy, asks her friend, Daiyousei.

Seeing the snow all over the lake, both of them have no clue.

It must be those three Fairies of Light! They have such deceiving power to create visual and audio illusions! So thinks Cirno.

Because she clearly remembers yesterday was just a normal summer day on which she was playing with other fairies under the sun.

Or, did she?

Gameplay: 

Stomp on enemies' head to deliver attack!

Supports both single player and multiplayer.

  • Cirno (Player 1): Move - A D; Fly - F G
  • Daiyousei (Player 2): Move - Left Right (Arrow Keys); Fly - < > (Bracket Keys)
  • Press ESC to pause. 
  • Press ALT + Enter to go full-screen.

At least, this is the case before inconsistency appears in their memories...
